title: PowerShell 101 and an Introduction to the AST.
summary:
Good morning everyone, sorry for the delay in getting this invite put together.  I have recently changed jobs and the transition has taken up a bit more time then I thought.  Anyway, Micah and have been discussing what to do next, and we decided to do a PowerShell 101.  Dive into some of the basics of PowerShell.  Micah will be giving a demo on some basics PowerShell practices.  Then I will be giving a very brief discussion on the AST Class msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.management.automation.language.ast%28v=vs.85%29.aspx.  And the reason I will be doing that is because we are going to create a Group Project that we can all work on to develop a Spell Checker in the ISE github.com/GRPosh/ISESpellCheck.  To start, i would like it to spell check comments, and then if we can even strings.  And the AST will help us parse code to do this.

We think it will be a good time, and we hope to see you all there.

have a great day

Thomas Malkewitz @dotps1
